author: Lon.TV
description:
I got mine here: https://lon.tv/3cdrl (not an affiliate link) -  The Summercart 64 is a very affordable flash cartridge for the Nintendo 64 that breathes some new life into the old console. In addition to working as a traditional flash cartidge it can also emulate the Japanese 64DD add-on. See more retro: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIswkmY7xCvaH3K_78rUsEIO and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

Menu System Download: https://github.com/Polprzewodnikowy/N64FlashcartMenu/releases/tag/rolling_release

Summercart Github: https://github.com/Polprzewodnikowy/SummerCart64

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:33 - Demo
01:40 - Price, Availability and Tariff Warning
03:03 - Summercart Project Page - https://summercart64.dev/
03:37 - Hardware Overview
05:16 - Menu Features
05:53 - Will Not Emulate Expansion / Controller Paks
06:34 - Save Game Files, No Save States
07:11 - Adding Favorites
07:42 - 64DD Disk System Support
10:18 - F-Zero Expansion Pak Demo
12:33 - 64DD Setup - https://lon.
title: Dust Off Your Nintendo 64! The Summercart 64 lets you play every game and unlock some new tricks
